--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Jerry Louis" <jerrylouis@m...> wrote:
> Hi,
> 
> I am trying to write unit tests for a class with multi-threading.  
> Is there a separate framework available for this?

ActiveTestSuite is included with JUnit.  It runs the test methods in
separate threads.  This could be of use to you.

Dave
